div.p: Daily newspaper, the full title of which was: Hamburger Nachrichten: Morgenzeitung für Politik, Handel, und Schiffahrt: Organ für Hamburgische Angelegenheiten, Anzeiger (Hamburg News: Morning Paper for Politics, Trade, and Shipping: Organ for Hamburg Affairs, Advertizer). Published by Hermann, the paper was founded in 1849 and ceased publication on March 9, 1939.
The music critic for the Hamburger Nachrichten was Ferdinand Pfohl between 1892 and 1932 and Herman Roth between 1932 and 1935.
